thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Researchers Race to Thwart Toxic Algae Outbreaks

author: Kris Maher
title: Researchers Race to Thwart Toxic Algae Outbreaks
text:
Ed Weinberg thinks he has developed the best way to stop the toxic blooms of blue-green algae that have been fouling bodies of water from the Florida Everglades to the Great Lakes and beyond.
The algae feed on phosphorus from farms and wastewater treatment plants that makes its way into rivers and lakes. Mr. Weinbergâ€™s solution deploys tiny beads of engineered resin that can absorb the mineral from water and extract it for reuse.
...
